examples: Epic low-cut camera capture of a girl clad in ultraviolet threads, Peter Max art style depiction, luminous diamond skin glistening under a vast moon's radiance, embodied in a superhuman flight among mystical ruins, symbolizing a deity's ritual ascent, hyper-detailed
prompt.title: Prompt

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video

resolution.title: Resolution
resolution.description: The resolution of the generated video

style.title: Style
style.description: The style of the generated video

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds. 8s videos cost double. 1080p videos are limited to 5 seconds

seed.title: Seed
seed.description:
The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model
            will output the same video every time.

examples: blurry, low quality, low resolution, pixelated, noisy, grainy, out of focus, poorly lit, poorly exposed, poorly composed, poorly framed, poorly cropped, poorly color corrected, poorly color graded
negative_prompt.title: Negative Prompt
negative_prompt.description: Negative prompt to be used for the generation

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
